Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Sant Josep de sa Talaia (Bahia de Sant Antonio), Fiesta Hotel Milord is convenient to Pinet Beach and Sunset Strip. This beach hotel is within close proximity of Passeig de ses Fonts and San Antonio Marina Port.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 371 air-conditioned guestrooms. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and ceiling fans.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities, which include bicycles to rent. Additional amenities include supervised childcare/activities, an arcade/game room, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Fiesta Hotel Milord. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Fiesta Hotel Milord. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Sant Josep de sa Talaia (Bahia de Sant Antonio), Fiesta Hotel Milord is convenient to Pinet Beach and Sunset Strip. This beach hotel is within close proximity of Passeig de ses Fonts and San Antonio Marina Port.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Pinet Beach - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Sunset Strip - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Passeig de ses Fonts - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
San Antonio Marina Port - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Port des Torrent Beach - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Calo des Moro Beach - 1.7 km / 1 mi
San Antonio Beach - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Egg of Columbus - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Cala Gracio Beach - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Cala Gracioneta Beach - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Punta Galera Beach - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Cala Bassa Beach - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Cala Salada Beach - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Cala Conta Beach - 5.7 km / 3.6 mi
Sant Rafel Church - 10.2 km / 6.3 mi

The preferred airport for Fiesta Hotel Milord is Ibiza (IBZ) - 12.9 km / 8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Fiesta Hotel Milord is Ibiza (IBZ) - 12.9 km / 8 mi.
